title: Can't choose summoner name.
body: I type in the summoner name i want, but i cant press okay. It says that the summoner name is available. Can anyone help?

replies.body:
If this is the first summoner name for the account (I.e. a new account) then you'll want to ensure the name hasn't previously been used. If it has, then you can only take that summoner name by purchasing a *summoner name change*, as per our [Summoner Name Cleanup Initiative](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
